archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1479
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer, I want to be able unlock my network locked device via our website, by entering my device IMEI number and paying a fee off my credit/debit card, so that I can unlock my device.

properties.value: Network locked device = blocked SIM? - possible OOTB Blocked by the operator for not paying? How it is handled vs micropurchases / subscription model?

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
